page.title: 09EDUCATION
page.content: There are three small village schools in our area catering for the immediate communities.Hathern is the largest, having a total of 139 pupils,6 staff.There are two different buildings spaced 400 yards apart. The old school is situated in the centre of the village.The new school was built in 1973.The Community Centre was built in 1981 to cater for the needs of various clubs.Entertainments are run here.In school the class size is around 30 per class.Children start before their fifth birthday.Leave village school when they are eleven.School day begins 9am.Lunch at 12.00.Afternoon school 1.15_3.30pm.School held five days per week.Main holiday_7-8 weeks in July_August.
